thread.title: Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts

title: Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts
text:
Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts 12:06pm BST - 01:41
The Syrian army unleashed a massive bombardment on the largest encircled rebel stronghold in Syria on Monday (April 30), as the forces of President Bashar al-Assad seek to crush remaining rebel outposts. David Doyle reports.
The Syrian army unleashed a massive bombardment on the largest encircled rebel stronghold in Syria on Monday (April 30), as the forces of President Bashar al-Assad seek to crush remaining rebel outposts. David Doyle reports. //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/05/01/assad-turns-his-sights-on-syrian-rebel-o?videoId=422906937&videoChannel=13422
